name: Henry's Island
description:
Dive into the wonders of the Mushroom Island and heal it from its deadly infection. When mysterious circumstances bring you into the magical Mushroom Forest you are tasked with bringing peace back to the island and defeating the terrible Henry. Battle virus and infections around the island in order to take back what they have stolen. The more infections you destroy the more powerful you become. Steal energy with one hand, deal damage with the other.

The game is an open world exploration and combat game. The game is about 2-3 Hours in length, with 4 bosses and 4 areas to explore. The games world is that of the Mushroom Island, a magical island in an unknown area of the sea. You, an adventurer. reached the Mushroom Island by becoming lost at sea and eventually washing up on your raft. However, upon washing ashore, you soon discover that the island has been taken over by a sort of infection, and now it’s your job to exterminate it. As you fight through hordes of enemies, you can power yourself up through various skill trees, and chests scattered around the island. Also scattered around the island are various cave painting that help tell the story of this island and how Henry became the way he is.
